Serious crash in Tairua closes SH25, cyclist injured https://www.nzherald.co.nz https://www.nzherald.co.nz The crash involved a vehicle and a bicycle on Main Rd (State Highway 25). Wed, 12 Mar 2025 22:10:45 +0000 Emergency services are at a serious crash at Tairua in the Coromandel.
